_metadata.description: 12 standardized lapse categories for improper redressal classification

lapses.name: GRA did not speak directly with the citizen
lapses.description: Officer closed grievance without calling citizen to verify resolution
examples: Officer marked case resolved without speaking to applicant
No telephonic verification done before closure
GRA did not contact citizen at any point

lapses.name: Not visited site / No field verification
lapses.telugu: సైట్ సందర్శన లేదు / క్షేత్ర పరిశీలన చేయలేదు
lapses.description: Officer marked resolved without physical site inspection
examples: Survey officer marked resolved without site visit
Revenue officer closed case without field inspection
No physical verification of work completion

lapses.name: Wrong / Blank / Not related to grievance closure comments
lapses.telugu: తప్పు / ఖాళీ / సంబంధం లేని ముగింపు వ్యాఖ్యలు
lapses.description: Endorsement comment wrong, blank, or not related to actual grievance
examples: Blank endorsement uploaded
Future tense used ('will be done') instead of completion status
Comment not related to actual grievance

lapses.name: GRA did not speak properly / scolded / used abusive language
lapses.telugu: GRA సరిగా మాట్లాడలేదు / తిట్టారు / అసభ్యంగా మాట్లాడారు
lapses.description: Officer used rude, abusive, or unprofessional language with citizen
examples: Officer used rude language with citizen
GRA scolded applicant instead of helping
Abusive behavior reported during interaction

lapses.name: Wrong department assignment / Not under jurisdiction
lapses.description: Case wrongly marked as not under officer's department or jurisdiction
examples: Case wrongly marked as 'not under our department'
Jurisdiction issue - passed to wrong department
Officer refused claiming not their responsibility

lapses.name: Improper enquiry photo / enquiry report / redressal flag uploaded
lapses.telugu: సరికాని విచారణ ఫోటో / విచారణ నివేదిక / పరిష్కార ఫ్లాగ్
lapses.description: Uploaded incorrect, irrelevant, or incomplete evidence documents
examples: Uploaded incorrect or irrelevant photos as evidence
Enquiry report incomplete or not matching grievance
Redressal flag marked wrong

lapses.name: GRA did not provide endorsement personally
lapses.description: Junior officer provided endorsement instead of responsible GRA
examples: Junior officer provided endorsement instead of GRA
Endorsement delegated to lower official
No personal endorsement from responsible officer

lapses.name: GRA did not spend time explaining issue to applicant
lapses.description: Officer did not explain resolution process or clarify issues with citizen
examples: Officer did not explain resolution process to citizen
No time spent clarifying issues with applicant
Rushed through case without proper explanation

lapses.name: GRA closed by forwarding to lower-level official instead of resolving
lapses.telugu: GRA పరిష్కరించకుండా దిగువ అధికారికి ఫార్వార్డ్ చేశారు
lapses.description: Senior officer delegated to junior without actually resolving the issue
examples: Tahsildar forwarded case to VRO and closed it
Senior officer delegated to junior without resolution
Case forwarded downward without solving

lapses.name: GRA intentionally avoided work / refused service
lapses.description: Officer intentionally stopped work or asked citizen to return repeatedly
examples: Officer said 'come again later' repeatedly
Work intentionally stopped by saying officer not available
Site work not happening - asked to return multiple times

lapses.name: GRA threatened / pleaded / persuaded applicant
lapses.description: Officer threatened, pleaded, or persuaded citizen to accept incomplete work
examples: Officer threatened citizen if complaint not withdrawn
GRA pleaded to close case without proper resolution
Citizen persuaded to accept incomplete work

lapses.name: GRA did not work and involved political persons
lapses.telugu: GRA పని చేయకుండా రాజకీయ వ్యక్తులను చేర్చారు
lapses.description: Political interference caused work stoppage or improper handling
examples: Political interference caused work stoppage
Officer involved political persons causing trouble
Political pressure led to improper handling

lapses.name: GRA took bribe / asked for bribe / stopped work for not paying
lapses.telugu: GRA లంచం తీసుకున్నారు / అడిగారు / చెల్లించనందుకు పని ఆపారు
lapses.description: Bribe demanded, taken, or work stopped due to non-payment
examples: Bribe demanded to complete work
Work stopped because bribe not paid
Officer took money for service delivery

top_3_lapses: GRA did not speak directly with the citizen (42.19%)
Not visited site / No field verification (15.83%)
Wrong / Blank / Not related closure comments (12.44%)

usage_notes.classification: Use for multi-label lapse prediction in audit cases
usage_notes.detection: Use detection_keywords for automated lapse identification from audit feedback
usage_notes.severity: Critical lapses require immediate action and potential disciplinary measures
usage_notes.training: Frequency percentages help with class balancing in imbalanced datasets
usage_notes.bilingual: Telugu names and keywords enable processing of Telugu audit reports
